Write-Up Text: People continue to express their opinions on a range of political issues in Australia. Discussions include an upcoming budget filled with incentives for small businesses NDIS funding cuts from the Labor Party and government incompetence and corruption labelled with the hashtags #auspol #LNPIncompetence and #LNPCorruption. Others critique the polarizing shifts in political alliances and ideologies or urge a more measured approach reminding us of past achievements in social security. The public remains watchful ready to hold politicians accountable and demand sustainable policy solutions for their community.
